answers.answer: Im 32w 3d and last week I had a sharp pain in my ribs also. I saw my ob on Friday & questioned it. She said it's the baby getting bigger and stretching causing some pain. I think if it's a continuous pain then address the issue w/ your ob.

i wondered the same thing when i was about 29-30 weeks also, its normal. my Dr said its even more common for the right ribs to hurt more than the left for some reason. bad part, it gets more sore. im 38 weeks tmrw and i ache really badly when shes being a lil terror in there, and always on my right side. ive def got an active lil booger!
I would mention it at your next appt. It's probably just round ligament pain, but if it turns persistent, it could be something else. I know preeclampsia can cause upper right quadrant pain.

question: Hi I'm 31w2d nd I had a pain on my right side of my stomach nd my rib too it hurts a lot ....do u guys think it's my baby girl doing this or something else cud be wrong..she is a really active baby already so idk if it's her
title: Baby hurting
